00074   function get_collision_distance(xs)
00075 
00076     double precision              :: get_collision_distance
00077     double precision, intent(in)  :: xs
00078 
00079     get_collision_distance = -log(rand()) /xs

00081   end function get_collision_distance

00104   function get_collision_type(absxs, scattxs, totxs)
00105 
00106     integer                       :: get_collision_type
00107     double precision, intent(in)  :: absxs, scattxs, totxs
00108     double precision              :: rn
00109 
00110     ! get rn
00111     rn = rand()
00112 
00113     ! absorption in first bin, scattering in second
00114     if (rn < absxs/totxs) then
00115       get_collision_type = 1
00116     else
00117       get_collision_type = 2
00118     end if
00119 
00120   end function get_collision_type
